original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁsenti.
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁ amūlak ena ▁saṃghādises ena ▁anu ddh aṃ sen ti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
“kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁsessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁ amūlak ena ▁saṃghādises ena ▁anu ddh aṃ ses s antīti ▁pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
analyzed: ▁saccaṃ ▁kira ▁tumhe ▁bhikkhave ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁ amūlak ena ▁saṃghādises ena ▁anu ddh aṃ se thāti

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁsessatha.
analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁tumhe ▁mogh apuris ā ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁ amūlak ena ▁saṃghādises ena ▁anu ddh aṃ se ssa tha

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
“Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁pana ▁bhikkhu ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁ amūlak ena ▁saṃghādises ena ▁anu ddh aṃ s eyya ▁pācittiy anti
▁a diṭṭh aṃ ▁a ssu taṃ ▁apari saṃ k itaṃ

original: codeti vā codāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
Upasampanne upasampannasaññī amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ▁upasampann e ▁upasampann asaññī ▁ amūlak ena ▁saṃghādises ena ▁anu ddh aṃ s eti ▁āpatti ▁pācittiy assa

original: Upasampanne vematiko amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ▁upasampann e ▁ve mati ko ▁ amūlak ena ▁saṃghādises ena ▁anu ddh aṃ s eti ▁āpatti ▁pācittiy assa

original: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ▁upasampann e ▁anupasampann asaññī ▁ amūlak ena ▁saṃghādises ena ▁anu ddh aṃ s eti ▁āpatti ▁pācittiy assa

original: Ācāravipattiyā vā diṭṭhivipattiyā vā anuddhaṁseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁ ācār avi pattiyā ▁vā ▁diṭṭhi vipatti yā ▁vā ▁anu ddh aṃ s eti ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
